mapper.insert: insert into todo_base( id, title, state, start_date, end_date, del_yn, frst_reg_date, last_chg_date )values( #{id}, #{title}, 'todo', now(), now(), 'N', now(), now() )
mapper.select: select no, id, title, content, state, del_yn from todo_base order by frst_reg_date desc
mapper.update: update todo_base set state = #{state}, last_chg_date = now() where no = #{no}
update todo_base set del_yn = 'Y', last_chg_date = now() where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no, id, title, content, state, date_format(start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') start_date, date_format(end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') end_date, date_format(start_date, '%H:%i') start_time, date_format(end_date, '%H:%i') end_time from todo_base where no = #{no}
